text: Stewart John Greenleaf Sr. (October 4, 1939 â€“ February 10, 2021) was an American Republican politician and attorney. He was a member of the Pennsylvania State Senate from 1979 to 2019. He also was a member of the Pennsylvania House of Representatives from 1977 to 1978. Greenleaf was born in Montgomery County, Pennsylvania. Greenleaf died on February 10, 2021 at age 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Members of the Pennsylvania General Assembly Category:Politicians from Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Stewart Greenleaf
